snippet.title: Train Simulator Classic is Out Now!
snippet.description:
Train Simulator Classic has arrived on Steam, featuring 3 routes including the new Leipzig - Riesa Extension!

Train Simulator Classic is now available on Steam and includes three routes for you to add to your collection. Witness the legendary Tehachapi loop with Tehachapi Pass, experience the pinnacle of UK high-speed travel with WCML South, and master complex signal systems in Bahnstrecke Riesa - Dresden which also includes the new Leipzig - Riesa route extension that adds an additional 65 km! 

Pick up your copy of  Train Simulator Classic now on Steam! 

🖥️ https://bit.ly/Train-Simulator-Classic-Steam 

You can find out more about these routes here: https://bit.ly/TS-Classic-Out-Now-3 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow us on social:
Facebook: https://bit.ly/38cjqML 
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3mU7fZ9
Instagram: https://bit.ly/362LaRx

ESRB Rating: Everyone

#TrainSimulator
